nodes.text: What has this got to do with guns? The root cause of crime/murder/etc is: 1) Family instability 2) Lack of education/economic opportunity 3) Drugs and hopelessness 4) Society acceptance of violence/media violence 5) In essence, social ills.

Well, until all those problems above are solved and we live in a utopia we'll still need gun-control. As long as we live in an imperfect society gun-control is necessary in the interest of public safety. Don't you keep bringing this subject up again and again?
